resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107230</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107230</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202676</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Exploring properties of matter with submersibles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschende Eigenschaften des Stoffes mit 
Submersibles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propriétés les explorant de matière avec des 
sous-marins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Propriedades explorando da matéria com 
submarinos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proprietà d'esplorazione della materia con i 
sommergibili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ερευνήσει τις ιδιότητες του θέματος με τα υποβρύχια
σκάφη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características que exploran de la materia con 
los sumergibles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This inquiry-based learning activity allows students to explore the relationships between mass, volume, density, and buoyancy as they manipulate various materials to construct a submersible "vehicle" for deep-sea research.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Anfrage-gegründete Lernenaktivität 
erlaubt Kursteilnehmern, die Verhältnisse zwischen Masse, 
Datenträger, Dichte und Tragvermögen zu erforschen, während sie 
verschiedene Materialien manipulieren, um einen versenkbaren "Träger"
für Tiefseeforschung zu konstruieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci étude enquête-basée permet à des 
étudiants d'explorer les rapports entre la masse, le volume, la 
densité, et la flottabilité pendant qu'ils manipulent de divers 
matériaux pour construire un "véhicule" submersible pour la 
recherche hauturière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto atividade de aprendizagem inquérito-baseada 
permite que os estudantes explorem os relacionamentos entre a massa, o
volume, a densidade, e o buoyancy enquanto manipulam vários materiais
para construir um "veículo submergível" para a pesquisa deep-sea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò attività imparante inchiesta-basata permette
che gli allievi esplorino i rapporti fra massa, volume, densità e 
galleggiabilità mentre maneggiano i vari materiali per costruire "un 
veicolo" sommergibile per ricerca di alto mare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η έρευνα-βασισμένη στο δραστηριότητα εκμάθησης 
επιτρέπει στους σπουδαστές για να ερευνήσει τις σχέσεις μεταξύ 
της μάζας, της έντασης του ήχου, της πυκνότητας, και της 
πλευστότητας δεδομένου ότι χειρίζονται τα διάφορα υλικά για να 
κατασκευάσουν ένα υποβρύχιο "όχημα" για τη βαθύβια έρευνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto actividad que aprende pregunta-basada permite
que los estudiantes exploren los lazos entre la masa, el volumen, la 
densidad, y la flotabilidad mientras que manipulan los varios 
materiales para construir un "vehículo sumergible" para la 
investigación de alta mar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

              <value>provider</value>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107230</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/exploring-properties-of-matter-with-submersibles</uri>
